*****
PyRRE
*****

Introduction
============
|pyrre| is Python software package to use Carlos Allende Prieto's `FERRE Fortran package <https://github.com/callendeprieto/ferre>`_.  You can use |pyrre| to fit observed spectra with the synthetic spectra from the grid.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1

   install
   tutorial
   modules
	      

Description
===========

|pyrre| can be used to fit spectra using a FERRE synthetic spectral grid.


Tutorial
========

Follow the instructions in the tutorial to use |pyrre| to fit your spectra.
